item.title:
RT by @gakonst: useful plugin for anyone using polars to process evm data:
polars_evm just implemented binary_to_float()
it uses native polars operations to convert u256/i256 to f64. 10x-20x faster than native python. this makes it trivial to decode most onchain events 🐻‍❄️🐻‍❄️

contrary to people dm'ing me about "value leakage", i feel excited by people building chains on reth.
the whole goal of the reth sdk is to commoditize performance & chain customizations so people can focus on building apps.
we'll integrate the best stuff upstream always anyway.
